show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
Should Angelina Jolie have had a bilateral mastectomy? Does estrogen influence the risk of sudden cardiac death? <!--more--> Can the mineral oil products you put on your skin cause cancer?
Should doctor assisted suicide be legalized?
Does Kava work for anxiety and is it safe?
Vicki’s 20-20 tips; A sense of humor is healthy!
Maxine’s thoughts for the day.
